availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Glasgow, Kentucky, attorney and judge. Virginia native. Attorney in Glasgow in 1860. Judge of the Barren County Court in 1862. Judge of Barren County Court in Barren County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Glasgow, District 2, p. 157.
Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1863, Legislative Document Series, No. 10 (Frankfort, KY: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1864), p. 304.
Acts of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, Passed by the General Assembly at the Adjourned Session (January 3, 1867) Which was Begun and Held in the City of Frankfort, on Monday, the 4th Day of December, 1865 (Frankfort, KY: John H. Harney, 1867), ch, 1282, p. 287.
KYR-0001-004-0442.
